name: Citizen
desc: An ordinary commoner.

name: Villager
desc: Simple townsfolk who have been forced to use the blade.

name: Samurai
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Swordmaster
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Thief
desc: Expert in stealth and subterfuge. Possess weak attacks but many other skills.

name: Swordfighter
desc: Professional soldiers for hire. Well-balanced, with superior abilities all around.

desc: Professional soldiers for hire. Well-balanced, with superior abilities all around.

name: Lancer
desc: The cornerstone of any armed force.

Average soldiers possessing

name: Pirate

Axewielders with great strength but
poor defense.

desc: Lightly armored soldiers armed with bows. Can attack from a distance.

name: Paladin

name: Bishop

desc: Kind-hearted healers.

name: Revenant

Walking corpses that move slowly

name: Entombed

Reanimated corpses. They're not fast,
